column1: Il est bel et bon, comm?re, mon mari.	LINK	"Very fair and fine
Il estoit deux femmes toutes d'ung pays.	See translation at Choral Public Domain Library:	"In the town
column2: two wives to chew the fat began
column3: Disanst l'une ? l'aultre - ""Avez bon mary?"""		"Saying to each other

column1: Il ne me courrousse, ne me bat aussy.		"He would never scold me
Il faict le mesnaige,		But he does the housework
Il donne aux poulailles,		And he feeds the chickens
Et je prens mes plaisirs.		While I do what I want.
Comm?re, c'est pour rire		"I tell you
Quand les poulailles crient:		To hear the chickens clucking:
Co co dac co co dac,		"Co co dac co co dac
Pierre Passereau		Carol Anne Perry Lagemann
